pr_title: Fix fetcher tests using correct month

timeline.message: Fix fetcher tests using correct month

timeline.body: See https://github.com/JabRef/jabref/blob/fix-fetcher-tests/src/test/java/org/jabref/logic/importer/fetcher/AstrophysicsDataSystemTest.java#L46 for the current JabRef way to set months. - Please also note the addition to `toString()` in the PR - commenting on the # thing (https://github.com/JabRef/jabref/blob/5418f526664005f69e576ca8dee85ee8b3a720d8/src/main/java/org/jabref/model/entry/BibEntry.java#L613) -- even though I did not link our documentation ^^
timeline.bodyText:
See https://github.com/JabRef/jabref/blob/fix-fetcher-tests/src/test/java/org/jabref/logic/importer/fetcher/AstrophysicsDataSystemTest.java#L46 for the current JabRef way to set months. - Please also note the addition to toString() in the PR - commenting on the # thing (
  
    
      jabref/src/main/java/org/jabref/model/entry/BibEntry.java
    
    
         Line 613
      in
      5418f52
    
    
    
    

        
          
                * used, it is output as "field = {#value#}", which may cause headaches in debugging. We nevertheless do it this way 
        
    
  

) -- even though I did not link our documentation ^^
timeline.bodyHTML:
See https://github.com/JabRef/jabref/blob/fix-fetcher-tests/src/test/java/org/jabref/logic/importer/fetcher/AstrophysicsDataSystemTest.java#L46 for the current JabRef way to set months. - Please also note the addition to toString() in the PR - commenting on the # thing (

jabref/src/main/java/org/jabref/model/entry/BibEntry.java

Line 613 in 5418f52

* used, it is output as "field = {#value#}", which may cause headaches in debugging. We nevertheless do it this way
) -- even though I did not link our documentation ^^
timeline.author: koppor
